name: Magma Tides
description:
A group of friends are stranded in a world of monsters, skeletons, ghosts, and other creatures. They are there just in time to save this world from an evil wizard by the name of Kaa'atomic.

To take down this force of evil, you we need to use all of your friends abilities:

Daniel; Sage.

Car-of-the-Cidi's; Archer.

Anthony; Samurai.

Gianluca; Swordsman.

Orbistal; Witch.

And, of course, yourself, Jack; Paladin.

Together, you can help Jack and his friends save this new world from destruction. (Also, there is all sorts of SWEET loot to find along the way!)

So, grab your swords, spears, staffs, bows,and katanas, to embark on an epic journey in the Action/Adventure RPG of the summer. Get ready to enter the world of...

MAGMA TIDES

(only on Windows)
